result.title: Patent applications
result.description: The market opportunities from the results of the project will be protected by filing patent applications where the results are patentable design protection and trademark applications at the first opportunity as well as solid legal agreements with new and existing customers The pre liminary patent strategy foresees the first patent appli cations will be filed as international patent applications PCT during the second half of the project The expect ed key IPR items developed during the given project are related to intelligent packaging solutions

result.title: Revamped communications materials
result.description: The positive environmental impact from the Repack solution needs to be communicated well to enhance the solutions uptake Attention needs to be paid to making the messages understandable and visualising them Communication channel format and frequency needs to be considered in addition to message content Addi tionally the presentation of the Repack solution on the retailers ecommerce website needs to be optimisedTask 51 includes and results in a thorough development of the communication materials and the development and implementation of a solid communications plan
